responses:
The list of courses offered under B.E are:
1. CIVIL ENGINEERING
2. MECHANICAL ENGINEERING
3. ELECTRICAL & ELECTRONICS ENGINEERING
4. ELECTRONICS & COMMUNICATION ENGINEERING
5. INDUSTRIAL ENGINEERING & MANAGEMENT
6. COMPUTER SCIENCE AND ENGINEERING
7. ElECTRONICS & TELECOMMUNICATION ENGINEERING
8. INFORMATION SCIENCE AND ENGINEERING
9. ELECTRONICS & INSTRUMENTATION ENGINEERING
10. MEDICAL ELECTRONICS ENGINEERING
11. BIO TECHNOLOGY
12. CHEMICAL ENGINEERING
13. AEROSPACE ENGINEERING
14. ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND MACHINE LEARNING
15. COMPUTER SCIENCE AND ENGINEERING (DATA SCIENCE)
16. COMPUTER SCIENCE AND ENGINEERING (INTERNET OF THINGS AND CYBER SECURITY INCLUDING BLOCK CHAIN TECHNOLOGY)
17. ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE (AI) AND DATA SCIENCE
18. COMPUTER SCIENCE AND BUSINESS SYSTEMS

patterns: what is the location of the college
responses: B.M.S College of Engineering is Located near Bull Temple Road,Basavangudi Bangalore - 560 019 Karnataka, India.

patterns: how many semesters are there in a year
how many semesters one should study in a year
responses: There are two semesters in a year.

patterns: how many months are there in a semester
how long will be a single semester
responses: The single semester will be around 4 months.

patterns: what are the student requirements for admission
responses:
Eligibility Criteria:A candidate who has Passed in 2nd PUC / 12 Std / Equivalent Examination with English as one of the Language and obtained a Minimum of 45% of Marks in aggregate in Physics and Mathematics as compulsory subjects along
 with Chemistry / Bio Technology / Biology / Computer Science / Electronics as optional subjects in the qualifying examination is eligible to pursue in under graduate programs (BE).

patterns: how many classes will be there in a day
responses: There may be Four to Six classes per day. Each class will be of 55 minutes

patterns: what is the teaching style of this college?
Is the teaching pattern different from other college?
how do they teach in college
responses:
Our college has different teaching patterns than other colleges of India, following the LTW techniques which stands for Lecture, Tutorial and Workshop.
You can provide us with your contact details and our counselors shall reach out to you and provide you with further details.

patterns: how are exams conducted in college
responses: Each semester consists of three internal tests and one sem end examination with Alternative assesment tools
You can message us here at any hours. But our college premises will be open from 9:00 am to 5:00 pm only.

patterns: will there be any extra curriculum activities?
does the college conducts any fun program
do we get funtime in college
in clg do u have refresment zones
responses:
Yes, Of course. Our college not only provides excellent education but also encourage students to take part in different curriculum activities. The college conducts yearly programs like Sports meet, Music,Dance,Arts,Dram and acting. 
you name it we have it. 
 Also our college has basketball court, badminton court, chess, carrom board and many more refreshment zones.

patterns: what facilities are provided by the college?
what are the facilities of college for students
responses: With excellent education facilities, Our College provides various other facilities like  Library, classes with AC, discusson room, canteen, parking space, and student service for any students queries.
